last_episode_to_air.name: Last Rites
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lagaac figures out Cruz is the cameraman. Cruz' guilt drives him to burn down the greenhouse and other incriminating evidence. In a flashback, Cruz asks Magic Mike to remove his memories through a ritual. When Lagaac passes out after their confrontation, Cruz asks Mike to perform the ritual on both of them. Lagaac forgets what happened but now experiences the same nightmare and headaches that haunt Cruz. A new tape arrives but the bizarre footage shows her nightmare instead. Judy suddenly appears at the station, disheveled and back from the dead.

name: The Tapes
overview: The year is 1999. In a cold sleepy town in the Philippine mountains, Officer Sonny Cruz begins receiving mysterious voyeuristic videotapes of a missing woman who vanished three years prior. As he begins to investigate the tapes with his partner Officer Alice Lagaac, the two regular cops become entangled in a world of mystery, supernatural and the occult.‚Äù
